attributes.comment:
This increase is absolutely apalling. The service currently provided by this agency for these
services is ridiculous--it took over two years for us to receive the Certificate of Citizenship for our
adopted daughter . . . and we still have not received word for the Certificate of Citizenship for our
other children. It has been three years. Additionally, we were charged extra in those two years
because the fees went up and our paperwork had not yet been processed--and that was thirteen
months after we submitted it! In other words, after we had had our paperwork in for over a year, we
received notice that we would need to pay more because the fees had just increased. Stop this
insane increase in fees.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Keith Jones
